messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Fwd:  OT sort of:  About the Pearls' book /child ...
messages.msgSnippet: I had this book about 8 years ago and was so outraged I called  social services where they live. I cannot believe that this book is still in  existence. I
messages.messageBody:
I had this book about 8 years ago and was so outraged I called social
services where they live. I cannot believe that this book is still in existence. I
happened to find a copy at Goodwill last week. It is the most disgusting,
sick handbook on how to torture your children. These people cannot be sane. I
will do all I can to get it off of Amazon and anywhere else it is sold.

Lorrie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
